title: Hour 2: CFP Push
description:
Stephen A., Marcus Spears, Bart Scott, Heather Dinich, Kendrick Perkins and Monica McNutt discuss Kyrie Irving's future in Brooklyn, can LSU hop into the playoff picture and who shines brighter Sunday: Henry or Mahomes?

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: Can No.3 Georgia afford to slip up against No.1 Tennessee?
